title: (x) Crailtap - Too Much {David H}
content:
Hello,   
Does somebody know the name of this font ?   
Thx

comments.content:
Visual Graphics' ' [Too Much](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817121755/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21436.html?1070041790)', as revealed by fellow Typophile Grant Hutchinson before..   
   
_The world famous 'Typophile Advanced Search' ( In cooperation with ' [Google](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817121755/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&q=crailtap%2Btype)', because the Typophile search actually isnt really working right now ) tells the truth.: [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35091.html?1084852396](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817121755/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35091.html?1084852396)
